projects.name: kalaca
projects.description: This is a game built using javascript and the phaser3.js game engine. The idea for this game came about after a discussion with a friend about how the protagonists of video games tend to be conventionally 'good' and the enemies conventionally 'bad'. We decided it would be interesting to make a game where the roles are reversed. Here the protagonist is a diabolical skull and the enemies are angels. My role was design and development as well as creating the sprites. The music and sfx were made by my friend Sam.

projects.name: synth world
projects.description: This is a browser based music sequencer and recorder, built using React and Tone.js. It consists of one polyphonic sampler 'synth', one monophonic sampler 'synth', and a 6 channel drum machine. The user can program a sequence on each of the instruments in real time, add effects and record their performance.

projects.name: p5 sketches
projects.description: These are a few sketches I have made over the last year of learning p5.js. Some of them are versions of Coding Train coding challenges, and some were made for the Weekly Creative Code Challenge hosted by Raphaël de Courville

projects.name: voices
projects.description: This project is an exploration of analogue animation and audio manipulation techniques. The drawings were done by hand using colored pencil, and the audio was recorded onto a 4-track cassette recorder and played back at varying speeds

projects.name: max preparat
projects.description: This music video was an experiment with mixing analogue textures and digital animation techniques. The textures were hand painted with spray paint and acrylic paint and then scanned. The actual animation was done using adobe animate, creating digital shapes and applying the scanned textures to them.

projects.name: la luz
projects.description: This is a music video for my band's most recent album. I wrote the script based on a part of The Master and Margarita by Mikhail Bulgakov, and as a band we collaborated on the costumes and props. I directed and edited the video.

projects.name: vats
projects.description: Vats was a post-punk band I played in for about 3 years in Seattle, Washington. I helped compose the songs as well as record them, and I played guitar and vocals. This is the LP we released on the End of Time label in 2016.

projects.name: gen pop
projects.description: Gen Pop was an experimental punk band I played in for a little more than a year in Olympia, Washington. I helped compose the songs and played bass and sang. This is the LP we released on PPM in 2020.

projects.name: american nudism
projects.description: American Nudism is an ongoing solo synth project that I have been doing on and off for about 10 years. This is a 7" EP I released on K records in 2018.

projects.name: arsun
projects.description: ARSUN is an ongoing experimental electronic dance music project that I have been a part of since 2018. I help compose the songs and am incharge of programming and sequencing sythesizers and drum machines as well as singing a bit. This is the most recent ep we released this year.

projects.name: tía rosa
projects.description: Tía Rosa is a Mexico City based band I have been playing in since 2021. I helped compose the songs and play bass, keyboard, drum machine sequencing, and occasional saxophone. This is the LP we released on on Inscrutable Records in 2024.
